content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_wart_block
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 59, "index": 23}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 49, "index": 27}, {"type": "acacia_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 59, "index": 36}, {"type": "polished_basalt", "quantity": 47, "index": 38}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 9, "index": 41}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 43}, {"type": "music_disc_stal", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a nether_wart_block, I need to place 9 nether_wart in a 3x3 grid. I will first move 1 nether_wart from slot 41 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1
